label: 唐時代
本: Exhibition of Shōsō-in Treasures , The 55th  . Nara National Museum . 2003
説明文: A Chinese dynasty, A.D. 618-907, whose cultural influence dominated the upper echelons of Japanese society in the Nara period. Many of the treasures in the Shōsō-in were imported from Tang or made in the Tang style. [正倉院]
